setup_instructions.instruction: Insert capillary tubes into each buckle. Both red lines must be visible.
Clasp the buckles so they are secured to each support.
Double check that the clasps on the cylinders are secure.
Ensure the sterilization container fluid is above the minimum level marking. Otherwise perform servicing.
Ensure the maximum fill line in the waste reservoir is still visible. Otherwise, perform servicing.
Place one blood sample in the wholeblood holder. Ensure the lid of the microcentrifuge tube is closed properly.
Place the other sample in the designated slot within the centrifuge. Secure the lid of the centrifuge.
Double check that there are no alerts on the screen.
